channel.title: Softwares on Kaspar Rufibach, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Softwares on Kaspar Rufibach, PhD

item.title: lorenzgini: generalized Gini for sparse data situations
item.description: Calculates the standard Gini coefficient as well as the generalized coefficient, and plots Lorenz curves. The Lorenz plots show the line of maximal equality given the data.

item.title: sppt: Spatial Point Pattern Test
item.description: Implements several area-based tests that measure the degree of similarity at the local level between two spatial point patterns.
